Playbook.title: What kind of Scoundrel are you?
Playbook.subtitle: Your playbook represents your reputation in the underworld, your special abilities, and how you advance.

Background.title: What did you do before you joined the crew?
Background.subtitle: Pick a background and write a detail specific to you.
Background.select-prompt: Select a background to see its description and suggested details.
Background.deep-cuts-tagline: Full descriptions of these backgrounds can be found in the Deep Cuts Blades in the Dark expansion.

Heritage.title: What are your origins?
Heritage.subtitle: Pick a heritage and write a detail specific to you.
Heritage.select-prompt: Select a heritage to see its description and suggested details.
Heritage.deep-cuts-tagline: Full descriptions of these heritages can be found in the Deep Cuts Blades in the Dark expansion.

Actions.title: What do you do best?
Actions.subtitle: Assign action dots to actions that best represent you.

Options.character-creation-button: Character Creation: 7 action dots total, limit 2 per action
Options.mastery-advance-button: Mastery Advance: Allow actions to advance to 4

Actions.suggested-actions: Actions suggested by your background and heritage:

Hunt.label: Hunt
Hunt.description: Hunt a target; gather information about its location and movements; attack with precision shooting from a distance.

Study.label: Study
Study.description: Study a person, document, or item with close scrutiny to gather information and apply knowledge; gain a deeper understanding; do research.

Survey.label: Survey
Survey.description: Survey a location or situation to understand what's going on; sense trouble before it happens; gather information about opportunities or exploits.

Tinker.label: Tinker
Tinker.description: Tinker with mechanisms to create, modify, disable, or repair; disable a trap, pick a lock, or crack a safe. Use electroplasmic devices.

Finesse.label: Finesse
Finesse.description: Finesse an item from someone's pocket; employ subtle misdirection or sleight-of-hand; handle a vehicle or a mount.

Prowl.label: Prowl
Prowl.description: Prowl about unseen and traverse obstacles; climb, swim, run, jump, and tumble. Ambush with close violence—a backstab, throat cutting, black-jack, etc.

Skirmish.label: Skirmish
Skirmish.description: Skirmish with an opponent in close combat; assault or hold a position; brawl and wrestle.

Wreck.label: Wreck
Wreck.description: Wreck a place, item, or obstacle with savage force or carefully applied sabotage; breach defenses with force; create distractions and chaos.

Attune.label: Attune
Attune.description: Attune to spirits and the ghost field; channel electroplasmic energy; perceive and communicate with ghosts; understand spectrology.

Command.label: Command
Command.description: Command obedience with your force of personality; intimidate or threaten; lead an action with one of the crew's gangs.

Consort.label: Consort
Consort.description: Consort with connections from your heritage, background, friends, or rivals to gain access to resources, information, people, or places.

Sway.label: Sway
Sway.description: Sway someone with charm, logic, deception, disguise, or bluff; change attitudes or behavior with manipulation or seduction.

Abilities.title: What ability sets you apart in the crew?
Abilities.subtitle: Choose a special ability

Friends.title: Who owes you one and who's your bitter enemy?
Friends.subtitle: Mark one long-time ally, family relation, or lover. Then mark one rival, enemy, or betrayed partner.

Vice.title: Where do you go to get rid of your stress?
Vice.description: Choose a vice and record the name and location of your vice purveyor.
Vice.select-prompt: Select a vice to see its description and suggested purveyors.
Vice.purveyor-prompt: A description of where you go to indulge

Name-and-look.title: What are you known as in the underworld and what do you look like?
Name-and-look.subtitle: Record a name, criminal alias, and briefly describe your appearance.

Export.title: Export your scoundrel
Export.subtitle: Customize and share your character sheet.

Delete-scoundrel.title: Delete scoundrel?
Delete-scoundrel.message: Are you sure you want to delete this scoundrel? This action cannot be undone.

Tracking-consent.title: Tracking Preferences
Tracking-consent.message: Minimal tracking helps improve Scoundry by collecting anonymous data on characters, page visits, and feature usage. No personal information is collected or shared.

Language.title: Language
Language.message: Select a language to use for the user interface and character sheet.
